title: 🗣️ Relentless Whisper – @Pepex85
description: For mastering the art of speech, their words echoed through the darkness louder than any dagger.

title: 👻 Invisible Lurker – @amparitott
description: For mastering the art of stealth, always present yet unseen. A shadow among shadows.

title: 🎁 Guild Patron – @Kamove
description: For generously contributing to the guild’s coffers, ensuring new weapons and future quests.

title: 📢 Soul Summoner – @thejexter676
description: For bringing new initiates into the guild, expanding our influence across the realms.

title: 🕒 Guild Watcher – @patriciatru
description: For unwavering loyalty, watching over our shadows day after day without rest.

title: 🧠 Shadow Strategist – @Pepex85
description: For sharing arcane knowledge and tactics that saved many lives in the dark.

title: 🪓 Loyal Blade – @Carlixfeccion
description: For ferocity in battle and unquestionable commitment during every guild incursion.
